definition: A process of sending goods or items from one location to another, typically involving packaging, labeling, and transportation. It is commonly used in the context of e-commerce, online shopping, and mail order services.

examples.german: Der Versand erfolgt innerhalb von 2-3 Werktagen.
examples.english: The shipment will be made within 2-3 business days.

examples.german: Bitte geben Sie Ihre Versandadresse an.
